cookies.banner_text: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Configure your preferences to keep navigating with full capabilities.
cookies.cookie_setting_text: Choose which cookies you want to accept:
cookies.cookie1_text: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
cookies.cookie2_text: Custom cookies allow us to track your navigation on the blog section to better understand which content is most relevant to you, helping us improve our content offerings.
cookies.cookie3_text: These cookies are essential for the operation of our Site. They enable features such as secure log-in and page navigation. Without these cookies, the site cannot be fully functional in its registered sections.

contact_section.title: Contact us
content: We are here to help you with any questions you may have.

content.title: Scheduled maintenance
content.description: Factory-specification service intervals using original techniques and approved materials.

content.title: Mechanical repairs
content.description: Diagnosis and repairs of all mechanical systems by our experts with genuine, NOS and OEM parts.

content.title: Bodywork & Paint
content.description: Qualified bodywork and paintshop jobs with accurate and car-specific adaptive techniques.

content.title: Preservation Services
content.description: Preventive care and storage solutions to protect your vehicle and maintain its functions.

restoration.title: Preserving Porsche Heritage
restoration.subtitle: As witness of the history of the brand, we embrace the responsability of its legacy to preserve and restore some of the most iconic models.

title: Our responsability
to authenticity
content: We understand that when you entrust us with your Porsche to restore, you're sharing a piece of automotive history.
Our commitment goes beyond repair. We preserve the soul of each vehicle, maintaining every original specification with meticulous care and period-correct techniques.

methodology.title: Our restoration philosophy
subtitle: Each process is unique,  depending on the condition of the vehicle.
No matter the model, we always start from the same point in order to deliver the best result.

content.title: Assessment
content.description: Complete documentation and evaluation of current condition

content.title: Disassembly
content.description: Careful cataloging and photography of every component

content.title: Restoration
content.description: Precision work using original specifications and techniques

content.title: Rebuilding
content.description: Meticulous reassembly with restored or verified authentic parts

content.title: Quality Control
content.description: Final inspection and testing to ensure operability prior delivery

slots.title: Secure a slot now
content: Our commitment to authenticity means we accept only a limited number of restoration projects each year. For 2026, we have reserved just six slots for comprehensive restorations.

projects.title: Undergoing projects
subtitle: We are constantly sourcing impressive, captivating and exclusive restoration projects around the globe that will join our private collection or for our customers.

content.description: Coming from The Junkyard: The Rudi Klein Collection Auction of november 2024

content.title: 1974 911 2,7 Carrera
content.description: A true unicorn in original Magenta (Karminrot), one of the rarest and most eye-catching specs ever delivered.

content.title: 1964 356 SC
content.description: An restored original Bali Blue beauty, almost ready to go back on the road.

content: Looking to sell your car and buy a special unit? Get in touch with us, we can help you find the right one.
sourcing.cta_1: Tell us more about your car

rollingMuseum.title: The Rolling Museum
content: Discover the history of the brand through exceptional road trips, driving iconic models from our private collection.

title: 15 Classic Porsches and legendary roads for 3 days of pure driving
content: Take the wheel of 15 restored classic Porsches and enjoy three thrilling days of driving passion in legendary roads of Catalonia.
From the 356 to the 993, including a 911 2.4 S, 911 2.7 Carrera, and a 1978 928.
This isn’t just a drive, it’s living Porsche history.

contact.title: Contact us
content: We are here to help you with any questions you may have.
Fill the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
